titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the treatment of anesthesiologist assistants in the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the treatment of anesthesiologist assistants in the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill specifies that anesthesiologist assistants qualify for appointment to the Veterans Health Administration and additional pay.
